mageGuild1.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild1.name: Mage Guild Level 1

mageGuild2.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild2.name: Mage Guild Level 2

mageGuild3.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild3.name: Mage Guild Level 3

mageGuild4.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild4.name: Mage Guild Level 4

mageGuild5.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild5.name: Mage Guild Level 5

tavern.name: Tavern
tavern.description: The Tavern increases morale for troops defending the city.

fort.name: Fort
fort.description: The Fort provides your town with defensive walls.

citadel.name: Citadel
citadel.description: Including a 50% increase to base creature growth, the Citadel adds a keep, and other terrain obstacles, to a town's defenses.

castle.name: Castle
castle.description: The Castle adds two arrow towers, fortifies your town's defenses, and doubles base creature growth.

villageHall.name: Village Hall
villageHall.description: The Village Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 500 gold per day.

townHall.name: Town Hall
townHall.description: The Town Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 1000 gold per day.

cityHall.name: City Hall
cityHall.description: The City Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 2000 gold per day.

capitol.name: Capitol
capitol.description: The Capitol earns your kingdom 4000 gold per day.

marketplace.name: Marketplace
marketplace.description: With the Marketplace, you can buy and sell resources (exchange rates increase with each Marketplace you own).

resourceSilo.description: The Resourse Silo provides you with an additional +1 gem each day.
resourceSilo.name: Resourse Silo

blacksmith.description: The Blacksmith provides your armies with First Aid Tents.
blacksmith.name: Blacksmith

special1.description: The Blessed Pond produces a small random number of resources each week.
special1.name: Blessed Pond

horde1.description: The Forgotten Corridor increases Moroi production by 4 per week.
horde1.name: Forgotten Corridor

horde1Upgr.description: The Forgotten Corridor increases Strigoi production by 4 per week.
horde1Upgr.name: Forgotten Corridor

special3.description: The Zamolxes' Treasure earns you 10% interest of any gold you have at the start of each week.
special3.name: Zamolxes' Treasure

horde2.description: The Stone Arches increase Werewolves production by 2 per week.
horde2.name: Stone Arches

horde2Upgr.description: The Stone Arches increase Alpha Werewolves production by 2 per week.
horde2Upgr.name: Stone Arches

grail.description: The presence of the Column of Infinity increases weekly creature generation by 50%, provides your kingdom with an additional 5000 gold each day and increases the luck of all allied heroes by +2.
grail.name: Column of Infinity

dwellingLvl1.description: The Wolf Den allows you to recruit Wolf.
dwellingLvl1.name: Wolf Den

dwellingLvl2.description: The Cursed Ruins allows you to recruit Moroi.
dwellingLvl2.name: Cursed Ruins

dwellingLvl3.description: The Forest Lodge allows you to recruit Voinici.
dwellingLvl3.name: Forest Lodge

dwellingLvl4.description: The Black Citadel allows you to recruit Vampires.
dwellingLvl4.name: Black Citadel

dwellingLvl5.description: The Dacic Altar allows you to recruit Werewolves.
dwellingLvl5.name: Dacic Altar

dwellingLvl6.description: The Zgriptor's Cliffs allow you to recruit Zgriptors.
dwellingLvl6.name: Zgriptor's Cliffs

dwellingLvl7.description: The Mighty Grotto allows you to recruit Zmei.
dwellingLvl7.name: Mighty Grotto

dwellingUpLvl1.description: The Upg. Wolf Den allows you to recruite Dire Wolf.
dwellingUpLvl1.name: Upg. Wolf Den

dwellingUpLvl2.description: The Upg. Cursed Ruins allow you to recruite Strigoi.
dwellingUpLvl2.name: Upg. Cursed Ruins

dwellingUpLvl3.description: The Upg. Forest Lodge allows you to recruite Haiduci.
dwellingUpLvl3.name: Upg. Forest Lodge

dwellingUpLvl4.description: The Upg. Black Citadel allows you to recruite Vampire Lords.
dwellingUpLvl4.name: Upg. Black Citadel

dwellingUpLvl5.description: The Upg. Dacic Altar allows you to recruite Alpha Werewolves.
dwellingUpLvl5.name: Upg. Dacic Altar

dwellingUpLvl6.description: The Upg. Zgriptor's Cliffs allows you to recruite Fiercezgriptor.
dwellingUpLvl6.name: Upg. Zgriptor's Cliffs

dwellingUpLvl7.description: The Upg. Mighty Grotto allows you to recruite Balauri.
dwellingUpLvl7.name: Upg. Mighty Grotto
